channel.title: What are you voting for?
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/Old_School_RuneScape_Week_2
There are a few things that they're going to hold polls for:
[ul][li]Easter event – the 2007 Easter holiday event is re-activated to coincide with Easter this year.[/li] [li]Herb naming – unidentified herbs become grimy <herb name>.[/li] [li]Remove roof – a command to toggle the visibility all roofs on and off.[/li] [li]‘Enter’ to login – the enter key submits login information, rather than only the login button.[/li] [li]Bank booths – left click bank booths to instantly open the bank interface.[/li] [li]F2P worlds – still members only, but allows PKers to fight with F2P gear restrictions[/li][/ul]
I'd vote yes for all of these besides herb naming and bank booths. To me, right clicking isn't that big of a hassle.
Check the link above to see criteria for voting.

item.title: What are you voting for?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I voted yes on everything. I also quite like the f2p idea just because that’s the only pking I ever do.

Read full topic

item.title: What are you voting for?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Oh and I just voted yes straight down the board.

the elve age:

I don’t agree with the left clicking bank booths. Damn lazy people can just right click (I’m so used to right clicking I didn’t even know you could left click in EocScape)

I’ve played too many private servers, it’s my instinct to not right click now.

Read full topic

item.title: What are you voting for?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Yes to the easter event, and the option to remove roofs. No to Bank booths and pressing enter to log in, those choices are mine personally.

I’m kind of neutral on the herbs and the PK world, they don’t really bother me that much to be honest. It’d be nice if they could add 3-4 f2p worlds, although I’d say that’s unlikely to happen in the near future.

Read full topic

[quote=“ox random xi, post:27, topic:506933”]Just because you find it boring doesn’t mean others do too. Just make other people happy.[/quote]I don’t want the few worlds we have used on that update…
Why pay to play F2P?

item.title: What are you voting for?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:31, topic:506933”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=625165.msg4258095#msg4258095 date=1363120179]

Just because you find it boring doesn’t mean others do too. Just make other people happy.

This vote is meant to see what you want, not what others want. I think you forgot that.
[/quote]
Yeah, but it’s not directly affecting you so why does it matter?[/quote]
It uses resources & time creating it etc. The positive outcomes of introducing this aren’t that large in comparison to other things that could be done.

Read full topic

item.title: What are you voting for?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Easter event – Meh.
Herb naming – Meh, I think it's fine as unidentified.
Remove roof – YES. I absolutely hate roofing.
‘Enter’ to login – Convenient I guess? However, not that necessary.
Bank booths – Convenient I guess? However, not that necessary.
F2P worlds – I don't like PKing, so it doesn't bother me if this doesn't happen.

Read full topic
